articles.author: Amanda Friedman
articles.title: Trump’s team brushes off economic concerns ahead of 100-day mark - Politico
articles.description: Facing troubling polling, the White House insists tariffs and trade talks will pay off for Americans.
articles.content:
But top Trump officials arent playing into the findings.
There are a hundred different polls that say 100 different things, Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins said during an appearance on CNNs Sta… [+2711 chars]
